summary:
Ever had a ringing bell-like sound in your ears?  I couldn\'t figure out what it was right away, then realized it was a Nirnroot plant!

I have silenced them once and for all!
descriptionHtml:
Nirnroots - Silenced

Nart2007

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=325510

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1497

Description:  

Ever had a ringing bell-like sound in your ears?  I couldn\'t figure out what it was right away, then realized it was a Nirnroot plant!

I have silenced them once and for all!  

I just created a silenced sound file with Audacity (http://audacity.sourceforge.net/) and named it \"itm_nirnroot_lp\".  I HAVE NOT included 

the ORIGINAL sound file, as this is in breach of the Skyrim Nexus and Bethesda Softworks.  Just make sure to backup your original file, 

located in your \"STEAM\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\\Sound\\fx\\itm\\ingredient\" folder - if you\'ve extracted 

it, that is. Otherwise just install to your \"STEAM\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\\Sound\\fx\\itm\\ingredient\" folder.  To uninstall just delete 

the file.  An alternative is to use the Nexus Mod Manager located on this site.  This file in Nexus Mod Manager friendly!

Hope you enjoy!

Nart2007
author: Nart_2007
